place_1.name: The Ridge
place_1.description: A spacious open street in the heart of Shimla, offering panoramic views of the surrounding mountains and colonial-era buildings.

place_2.name: Dalai Lama Temple Complex
place_2.description: A spiritual center and residence of the Dalai Lama, featuring a peaceful ambiance and Tibetan architecture.

place_3.name: Jakhoo Temple
place_3.description: An ancient temple dedicated to Lord Hanuman, situated on Jakhoo Hill, the highest point in Shimla.

place_4.name: Jakhoo Hill
place_4.description: An ancient temple dedicated to Lord Hanuman, situated on Jakhoo Hill, the highest point in Shimla.

place_1.name: Bijli Mahadev Temple
place_1.description: A sacred temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, known for its tall staff that attracts lightning, offering panoramic views of the Kullu Valley.

place_2.name: Hadimba Devi Temple
place_2.description: An ancient cave temple dedicated to Hidimba Devi, surrounded by cedar forests and known for its unique pagoda-style architecture.

place_3.name: Vashisht Baths
place_3.description: Natural hot springs with separate bathing areas for men and women, believed to have healing properties.

place_1.name: Rohtang Pass
place_1.description: A high mountain pass on the eastern Pir Panjal Range of the Himalayas, known for its scenic beauty and adventure sports.

place_2.name: Great Himalayan National Park
place_2.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, home to diverse flora and fauna, offering trekking and wildlife viewing opportunities.

place_3.name: Kangra Fort
place_3.description: One of the oldest forts in India, offering panoramic views of the surrounding valley.
